response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs, and I believe it will greatly enhance your operations or personal use. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000, and an opportunity not to be missed. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Please let me know if you have any questions or need additional information.", "product_price": 14500}
